scripts.test-qa: set TEST_ENV=qa && npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test-prod: set TEST_ENV=prod && npx playwright test --headed && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test-qa: set TEST_ENV=qa && npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
scripts.headless-test-prod: set TEST_ENV=prod && npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
